atk-s0517a21:2_1: Idāni samasīsakathānantaraṁ attanā vuttassa iddhipāṭihāriyassa sādhake satta anupassanāvisese dassentena kathitāya suttantapubbaṅgamāya satipaṭṭhānakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a21:2_2: Tattha suttante tāva cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo, tena na tato heṭṭhā, na uddhanti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṁ dīpeti.
atk-s0517a21:2_5: Satipaṭṭhānāti tayo satipaṭṭhānā satigocaropi, tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0517a21:2_6: ‘‘Catunnaṁ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0517a21:3_0: ‘‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-s0517a21:3_1: 3.304, 311) ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā ‘‘satipaṭṭhāna’’nti vuttā.
atk-s0517a21:3_6: ‘‘Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni.
atk-s0517a21:3_9: patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhānaṁ, upaṭṭhāti okkanditvā pakkhanditvā vattatīti attho.
atk-s0517a21:3_11: Atha vā saraṇaṭṭhena sati, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena upaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:3_12: Iti sati ca sā upaṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:3_14: Yadi evaṁ kasmā satipaṭṭhānāti bahuvacanaṁ katanti?
atk-s0517a21:4_3: Sesapadānaṁ atthavaṇṇanā panettha sutamayañāṇakathāya maggasaccaniddesavaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttāyevāti.
atk-s0517a21:5_0: Kasmā pana bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā anūnā anadhikāti?
atk-s0517a21:5_2: Taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritasamathayānikavipassanāyānikesu hi mandatikkhavasena dvedhā dvedhā pavattesu mandassa taṇhācaritassa oḷārikaṁ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa sukhumaṁ vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:5_3: Diṭṭhicaritassāpi mandassa nātippabhedagataṁ cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa atippabhedagataṁ dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:5_4: Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena adhigantabbanimittaṁ paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa oḷārikārammaṇe asaṇṭhahanato dutiyaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:5_5: Vipassanāyānikassapi mandassa nātippabhedagatārammaṇaṁ tatiyaṁ, tikkhassa atippabhedagatārammaṇaṁ catutthaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:6_1: Kāyo hi asubho, tattha ca subhavipallāsavipallatthā sattā.
atk-s0517a21:6_2: Tesaṁ tattha asubhabhāvadassanena tassa vipallāsassa pahānatthaṁ paṭhamaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:6_3: Sukhaṁ niccaṁ attāti gahitesupi ca vedanādīsu vedanā dukkhā, cittaṁ aniccaṁ, dhammā anattā, tesu ca sukhaniccaattavipallāsavipallatthā sattā.
atk-s0517a21:6_4: Tesaṁ tattha dukkhādibhāvadassanena tesaṁ vipallāsānaṁ pahānatthaṁ sesāni tīṇi vuttānīti evaṁ subhasukhaniccaattavipallāsappahānatthaṁ vā cattārova vuttā.
atk-s0517a21:6_5: Na kevalañca vipallāsappahānatthameva, caturoghayogāsavaganthaupādānaagatippahānatthampi catubbidhāhārapariññatthampi cattārova vuttāti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:7_2: Sakalasarīre pana pathavīdhātūnaṁ bahukattā sabbapathavīdhātusaṅgahatthaṁ samūhatthena kāyaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ.
atk-s0517a21:7_5: Vakkādīni pana paricchinnattā kāyaggahaṇaṁ nārahantīti tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ na katanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:8_0: (Kha) sukhaṁvedanantiādīsu sukhaṁ vedananti kāyikaṁ vā cetasikaṁ vā sukhaṁ vedanaṁ.
atk-s0517a21:10_0: (Gha) tadavasese dhammeti tehi kāyavedanācittehi avasese tebhūmakadhamme.
atk-s0517a21:10_1: Sabbattha tena ñāṇenāti tena sattavidhena anupassanāñāṇena.
atk-s0517a21:10_2: Yāni panettha antarantarā avuttatthāni, tāni heṭṭhā tattha tattha vuttatthānevāti.
